Uses of Interface
popt4jlib.ObserverIntf

  • Packages that use ObserverIntf 
    Package Description
    graph.packing
    Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.BH
    Generalized Adaptive Basin Hopping
    popt4jlib.GA
    Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS.FA
    Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in graph.packing

      Classes in graph.packing that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  DBBTree
      singleton class represents the Branch&Bound Tree of the distributed version of the BB-GASP method for MWIS.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in parallel.distributed

      Classes in parallel.distributed that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge
      small bridge program that connects to a BCastSrv server as another client, as well as to a DAccumulatorSrv for getting its notifications, and submitting them to the broadcast server.
      Fields in parallel.distributed declared as ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ObserverIntf DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread._observer 
      Methods in parallel.distributed with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln) 
      static void DAccumulatorClt.registerListener(ObserverIntf observer, int notification_type)
      method must be called only once; it starts the DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread thread that will first send to the notifications server the type of notifications this client is interested in, and then will keep listening for double values representing new accumulated incumbents (new min or max values).
      boolean DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread.registerObserver(ObserverIntf o) 
      boolean DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread.removeObserver(ObserverIntf o) 
      Constructors in parallel.distributed with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Constructor and Description
      AsynchUpdateThread(ObserverIntf observer, int type)
      sole constructor.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib

      Classes in popt4jlib that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GLockingObservableObserverBase
      base class implementing both the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf interfaces with all implemented methods locking on the global "popt4jlib" w-lock.
      class  GLockingObserverBase
      base class implementing only the ObserverIntf interface -template method style-, with the implemented method locking on the global "popt4jlib" w-lock.
      Methods in popt4jlib with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GLockingObservableObserverBase.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      allows an ObserverIntf object to add back into the DGA process an improvement to the incumbent solution it was given.
      void SubjectIntf.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      add back a new solution produced by the obs Observer
      boolean GLockingObservableObserverBase.registerObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      allows an Object that implements the ObserverIntf interface to register with this object and thus be notified whenever new incumbent solutions are produced.
      boolean SubjectIntf.registerObserver(ObserverIntf o)
      registers an observer to listen to changes to this subject
      boolean GLockingObservableObserverBase.removeObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      removes an Object that implements the ObserverIntf that has been registered to listen for new solutions.
      boolean SubjectIntf.removeObserver(ObserverIntf o)
      removes an observer from this subject's registered observers

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.BH

      Classes in popt4jlib.BH that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DGABH
      A parallel/distributed implementation of the Generalized Adaptive Basin Hopping algorithm, using an island-model of computation, where multiple populations are evolved in separate "islands", exchanging individuals in the same migration model as in DGA and DPSO classes.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.GA

      Classes in popt4jlib.GA that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DGA
      The DGA class implements a thread-safe parallel Distributed Genetic Algorithm that follows the island-model of GA computation, with an elitist selection strategy that uses roulette-wheel selection of individuals based on their fitness (that is computed every generation).

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.GradientDescent

      Classes in popt4jlib.GradientDescent that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlternatingVariablesDescent
      Alternating Variables Optimization: the class implements a method suitable for the (box-constrained) local-optimization of functions in R^n where some or all of the function variables are constrained to assume values from a discrete set (eg when some variables must take on integer values only, or when some variables must take on values that are an integer multiple of some quantity).
      class  ArmijoSteepestDescentST
      Single-Threaded version of the ArmijoSteepestDescent class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  FletcherConjugateGradientST
      Single-Threaded version of the FletcherConjugateGradient class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST
      Single-Threaded version of the PolakRibiereConjugateGradient class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.PS

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DPSO
      A parallel implementation of the Particle Swarm Optimization algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects by extending the GLockingObservableObserverBase class, so that it may be combined with other optimization processes and produce better results.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.PS.FA

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS.FA that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DFA
      A parallel implementation of the Firefly Algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects by extending GLockingObservableObserverBase so that it may be combined with other optimization processes and produce better results.
